## SendableMoneyp.stakeRskSwapTokens() method

Stake Uniswap RBTC/BPD LP tokens to participate in liquidity mining and earn MP.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
stakeRskSwapTokens(amount: Decimalish): Promise<SentMoneypTransaction<S, MoneypReceipt<R, void>>>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  amount | [Decimalish](./lib-base.decimalish.md) | Amount of LP tokens to add to new or existing stake. |
